title: SX Attribute插件血量，攻击最大2048如何解决？

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
3466004892 发表于 2020-4-22 10:22
有没有封顶？
好像是double值
应该不超过1.8乘10的308次方就行
] Could not pass event EntityDamageByEntityEvent to SX-Attribute v2.0.2 org.bukkit.event.EventException]

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: 服务端目录下 spigot.yml 打开编辑 maxhealth和attackDamage下的数值调高试试 保存并重启服务器

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
应该是服务端的限制吧
在spigot.yml里面修改
